author: rbb
msg: Fix the rest of the APR_STATUS_IS_SUCCESS definitions.

author: rbb
msg: Tru64's sendfile implementation is completely broken, so we can't use it.
The problem is that autoconf finds it in libc, so we have to hack our
configuration.  If sendfile is used, then the machine hangs, and that's
really bad, so we should remove that code as well.

author: rbb
msg: Add a missing variable is APR_IS_SUCCESS macro

author: wrowe
msg: Attacking the problem from another front... borland users might want
something similar, if they have win32 ommisions from sys/stat.h.
